SELECT r.rid, concat_ws(",", ( SELECT name FROM menu WHERE mid = SUM(if(rm.mid = 1, rm.mid, NULL)) ), ( SELECT name FROM menu WHERE mid = SUM(if(rm.mid = 2, rm.mid, NULL)) )) AS menuList , r.name, description, role_code AS roleCode, created_time AS createdTime FROM role r LEFT JOIN role_menu rm ON r.rid = rm.rid LEFT JOIN menu m ON m.mid = rm.mid where true
and role_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{roleCode}),'%')
GROUP BY r.rid

and r.role_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{roleCode}),'%')
